title: University Teacher in the Department of Chemical Engineering

Fixed term for 12 months 
A new position has been created as University Teacher in The Department of Chemical Engineering to deliver teaching on a range of modules as required, and to provide practical instruction and enhancement of laboratory provision to undergraduate and postgraduate students. 
The role includes developing and delivering lectures as appropriate, laboratory classes, tutorial sessions, practical instruction, group working with students, assessment and administration. You will use your experience and specialist knowledge, to develop and improve teaching resources, and to engage with developments in the HE sector for the modernisation of laboratory provision and data analysis. This may include supervising projects, setting and marking of examination questions, developing laboratory scripts and coursework, which are consistent with the intended learning outcomes of high quality engineering programmes at both undergraduate and postgraduate level.
